name: Afterglow
lyrics:
作词 : 蔡徐坤/Max Ulver/Daniel Schulz
作曲 : 蔡徐坤/Max Ulver/Daniel Schulz
制作人 : 蔡徐坤/Max Ulver/Christian Coer/Jeffrey Z.
编曲 : 蔡徐坤/Max Ulver/Christian Coer/Jeffrey Z./Jordan Reifkind
In all these faces
茫茫人海之中
I see you
我看见你
No hesitation
不偏不倚
Only you
只看见你
You're a blue swimming pool
你化身一片碧蓝的泳池
We could dance in the middle of June
我们相拥起舞在六月未央
Let a new flower bloom
当初生的花蕾绽放
We could dance in the middle of June
我们相拥起舞在六月未央
In the afterglow
落日余晖下
Nothing lasts forever
一切终将消逝
In the afterglow
落日余晖下
Nothing lasts forever
一切终将消逝
All this temptation
怦然心动
I fall through
跃身坠入
What are we chasing
我们为何永无止境地追寻
Got no clue
无人知晓
So I go with the flow
逐浪而去
We could dance in the middle of June
我们相拥起舞在六月未央
Let a new flower bloom
当初生的花蕾绽放
We could dance in the middle of June
我们相拥起舞在六月未央
In the afterglow
落日余晖下
Nothing lasts forever
一切终将消逝
In the afterglow
落日余晖下
Nothing lasts forever
一切终将消逝
收起
